
```{r}
# Set seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)

# Create a 5 x 10 matrix of random integers
mat <- matrix(
  sample(1:100, 50, replace = TRUE),
  nrow = 5,
  ncol = 10
)

# Define column names
colnames(mat) <- c(
  "cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5",
  "ctrl1", "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5"
)

# Define row names
rownames(mat) <- paste0("gene", 1:5)

# View matrix
mat



# Compute means
cond_mean <- rowMeans(mat[, 1:5])
ctrl_mean <- rowMeans(mat[, 6:10])

# Compute fold change
fold_change <- cond_mean / ctrl_mean

# Create results table
results <- data.frame(
  ConditionMean = cond_mean,
  ControlMean = ctrl_mean,
  FoldChange = fold_change
)

results
```
